event_of_default.definition: Any one or more of the following events shall constitute a default under the terms of this Lease.

conditions.description: Failure of Tenant to pay any Rent or other sum of money due to Landlord or any other person.
conditions.time_frame: within ten (10) days after the same is due

conditions.description: Sale of Tenant’s interest in the Premises under attachment, execution or similar legal process.
